message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I know you're interested in. I'm asking for $12,000 for it. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product. While $9,000 is a good starting point, I'm hoping to get closer to my initial asking price of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $10,500?
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you at $9,500. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
